0110010101101001 0001101100110010 1 -> sum: 1000000010011100, cout: 0

1111000011011010 1101001101001010 1 -> sum: 1100010000100101, cout: 1
0010000000101110 0111101010000011 0 -> sum: 1001101010110001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
